meaningMnemonic: The <radical>thread</radical> that ties you to your <radical>clan</radical> is <kanji>paper</kanji>. Your papers, that is.
readingMnemonic: You need this specific <kanji>paper</kanji> to prove that you aren't a <reading>Commi</reading> (かみ), aka a Communist. Or that you are. It really depends on where you want to go and what decade this is.
